languages.text: {n}Юродивый и тощий, Гниль скалится мне щербатым ртом. Он — никто, с которого нечего взять. Его тело потрачено болезнью, пальцев не наберется и пяти, судьба — предрешена. И это делает его убедительным: все знают, что ему нечего искать для себя, а значит — незачем лгать. Его нищета — его броня.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Юродивый и тощий, Гниль скалится мне щербатым ртом. Он — никто, с которого нечего взять. Его тело потрачено болезнью, пальцев не наберется и пяти, судьба — предрешена. И это делает его убедительным: все знают, что ему нечего искать для себя, а значит — незачем лгать. Его нищета — его броня.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Юродивый и тощий, Гниль скалится мне щербатым ртом. Он — никто, с которого нечего взять. Его тело потрачено болезнью, пальцев не наберется и пяти, судьба — предрешена. И это делает его убедительным: все знают, что ему нечего искать для себя, а значит — незачем лгать. Его нищета — его броня.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

{n}Skinny and scrawny, Mildew grins at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody with nothing to take. His body is wasted by disease, his hands are five fingers short, his fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and therefore has no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der dünne und ausgemergelte Fäule schielt mich mit seinem weit offenen Mund an. Er ist ein Nichts und hat nichts. Krankheiten haben seinen Körper zerfressen. Ihm fehlen fünf Finger an den Händen. Sein Schicksal ist besiegelt. Und das macht ihn überzeugend: Alle wissen, dass er für sich selbst nichts zu gewinnen und demnach keinen Grund zum Lügen hat. Seine Armut ist seine Rüstung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der dünne und ausgemergelte Mehltau schielt mich mit seinem weit offenen Mund an. Er ist ein Nichts und hat nichts. Krankheiten haben seinen Körper zerfressen. Ihm fehlen fünf Finger an den Händen. Sein Schicksal ist besiegelt. Und das macht ihn überzeugend: Alle wissen, dass er für sich selbst nichts zu gewinnen und demnach keinen Grund zum Lügen hat. Seine Armut ist seine Rüstung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Escuálido y esquelético, Podredumbre me lanza una mirada de odio con la boca abierta. No es nadie y no tiene nada. Su cuerpo está consumido por la enfermedad. A sus manos les faltan cinco dedos. Su destino está sellado. Y eso le hace convincente: todos saben que él no tiene nada que ganar, y, por tanto, no tiene motivos para mentir. Su pobreza es su armadura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Escuálido y esquelético, Moho me lanza una mirada de odio con la boca abierta. No es nadie y no tiene nada. Su cuerpo está consumido por la enfermedad. A sus manos les faltan cinco dedos. Su destino está sellado. Y eso le hace convincente: todos saben que él no tiene nada que ganar, y, por tanto, no tiene motivos para mentir. Su pobreza es su armadura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ガリガリに痩せ細ったロットが、ぽかんと口を開けてこちらを横目で見る。何も持たない何者でもない男だ。体は病で衰えている。手は指が5本足りない。彼の運命は決まっていて、それが彼を説得力のある存在にしているのだ。誰もが男は何も手に入れられないと知っていて、それゆえに嘘をつく理由もないのだ。貧困こそ彼の鎧だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ガリガリに痩せたカビは、ぽかんと口を開けてこちらを横目で見る。何も持たない何者でもない男だ。体は病で衰えている。手は指が5本足りない。彼の運命は決まっていて、男はそれに納得している。誰もが男は何も手に入れられないと知っていて、それゆえに嘘をつく理由もないのだ。貧困こそ彼の鎧だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}“脓疮”骨瘦如柴，张着嘴，斜着眼睛看着我。这个无名之人一无所有，他的身体被病痛折磨得形销骨立，手上也缺了五根手指，看起来难逃一死。这样的情形，让他的话听起来很有说服力。所有人都知道他捞不到任何好处，因此他也没有理由说谎。他的困顿就是他的盔甲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“霉毯”骨瘦如柴，张着嘴，斜着眼睛看着我。这个无名之人一无所有。他的身体被病痛折磨得形销骨立，手上也缺了五根手指。看起来难逃一死。这样的情形，让他的话听起来很有说服力。所有人都知道他捞不到任何好处，因此他也没有理由说谎。他的贫穷就是他的盔甲。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maigre et chétif, Pourriture me regarde bouche bée. C'est un moins que rien dépossédé de tout. Son corps est rongé par la maladie. Il manque cinq doigts à ses mains. Son sort est scellé. C'est ce qui lui donne sa force de conviction : tout le monde sait qu'il n'a rien à gagner pour lui-même, et donc aucune raison de mentir. Sa pauvreté lui sert d'armure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maigre et chétif, Moisissure me regarde bouche bée. C'est un moins que rien dépossédé de tout. Son corps est rongé par la maladie. Il manque cinq doigts à ses mains. Son sort est scellé. C'est ce qui lui donne sa force de conviction : tout le monde sait qu'il n'a rien à gagner pour lui-même, et donc aucune raison de mentir. Sa pauvreté lui sert d'armure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir deri bir kemik kalmış Çürük, ağzı açık hâlde bana pis pis bakıyor. Hiçbir şeyi olmayan, hiçbir önem taşımayan birisi. Bedeni, hastalıkla eriyip bitmiş. Ellerindeki parmaklarından beşi eksik. Kaderi çoktan çizilmiş. Bu da onu inandırıcı kılıyor. Herkes, kazanacak hiçbir şeyi olmadığının ve bu nedenle yalan söylemesine bir sebep bulunmadığının farkında. Yoksulluğunu zırh gibi kuşanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Skinny and scrawny, Rot leers at me with his gaping mouth. He is a nobody who has nothing. His body has wasted away from disease. His hands are five fingers short. His fate is sealed. And that makes him convincing: everyone knows he has nothing to gain for himself, and thus no reason to lie. His poverty is his armour.{/n}
